ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger sweet and sour mix
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger triple sec (orange-flavored liqueur)
des: "Lemon-lime soda is spiked with whiskey, triple sec and a dash of sweet and sour mix. This was given to me by my aunt, it's divine!"
ins: Fill a tall glass with ice cubes and pour in the whiskey, sweet and sour mix, triple sec and lemon-lime soda. Stir with a straw and enjoy!
